总结：
question: 湘早籼45号是益阳市农科所采用品种间杂交育种方法,历经10a(1997~2007年)时间,育成的中熟早籼常规品种,于2007年2月通过湖南省品种市定委员会审定并命名。其主要特点是熟期早,全生育期105.9 d;高产稳产,3 a区试 (预试)产量均达到7.5 t/hm2以上;米质优,抗性好,适宜在湖南省稻瘟病轻发区作早稻种植。
answer: 湘早籼45号是益阳市农科所经过10年（1997-2007年）育成的中熟早籼常规品种，于2007年2月通过湖南省品种审定并命名。其特点是熟期早，全生育期105.9天，高产稳产，三年区试产量均达到7.5吨/公顷以上，米质优，抗性好，适合在湖南省稻瘟病轻发区种植。

总结：
question: 正宗的五常大米，产地一定是出自黑龙江省哈尔滨市五常市，同时包装袋上印有“中华人民共和国地理标志”和“产地证明商标”，这些大米是受国家质检总局授权并符合五常大米国家标准要求的，其大米质量相对更有保障。黑龙江气候比较冷，与海南一年可以种四季水稻相比，黑龙江五常这些地方，一年只能种一季水稻，而且生长期还很长，育苗更是需要借助大棚或是温室。而且水稻收获期五常地区的昼夜温差大，这些因素让五常的大米干物质含量高、直链淀粉适中、支链淀粉含量高。通俗地说，就是这里产的大米粒大饱满、口感弹牙、饭粒油量大、香味浓郁。广义上说，只要种子选用五优稻系列、松粳系列及其他符合五常种植条件种植的其他粳稻品种，符合大米执行标准GB/T 19266（也就是五常大米的执行标准），在五常地区种植，就可以称为“五常大米”了。
answer: 五常大米是产自黑龙江省哈尔滨市五常市的大米，包装上有“中华人民共和国地理标志”和“产地证明商标”。五常地区一年只能种一季水稻，生长期长，昼夜温差大，因此产出的大米干物质含量高、直链淀粉适中、支链淀粉含量高，粒大饱满、口感弹牙、油量大、香味浓郁。只要种子选用五优稻系列、松粳系列及其他符合五常种植条件的粳稻品种，且符合大米执行标准GB/T 19266，在五常地区种植，就可以称为“五常大米”。

原材料：
{}

总结：
question: 最适宜种植水稻的土壤类型是水稻土。水稻土是指在长期淹水种稻条件下，受到人为活动和自然成土因素的双重作用，而产生水耕熟化和氧化与还原交替，以及物质的淋溶、淀积，形成特有剖面特征的土壤。这种土壤由于长期处于水淹的缺氧状态，土壤中的氧化铁被还原成易溶于水的氧化亚铁，并随水在土壤中移动，当土壤排水后或受稻根的影响（水稻有通气组织为根部提供氧气），氧化亚铁又被氧化成氧化铁沉淀，形成锈斑、锈线，土壤下层较为粘重。
answer: 水稻土是最适合种植水稻的土壤类型，它在长期淹水和种植水稻的条件下形成。这种土壤具有特殊的剖面特征，包括水耕熟化、氧化与还原交替，以及物质的淋溶和淀积。由于长期处于缺氧状态，土壤中的氧化铁会被还原并在土壤中移动，形成锈斑和锈线。

总结：
question: 稻（Oryza sativa L.），通称水稻，按照生态功能可被划分为可食用植物。中国是水稻的原产地之一。中国南方地区农田多以水田为主，粮食作物以种植水稻为主。稻是亚洲热带广泛种植的重要谷物，中国南方为主要产稻区，北方各省也有栽种。种下主要分为2亚种，籼稻与粳稻。亚种下包括栽培品种极多。以成熟颖果入药。味甘，温。和中消食，健脾开胃。
answer: 稻，又称水稻，是一种可食用植物，是亚洲热带广泛种植的重要谷物。中国南方是主要的稻米产区，但北方也有种植。稻主要分为籼稻和粳稻两个亚种，并有许多栽培品种。稻米具有甘味和温性，可用于和中消食，健脾开胃。

总结：
question: 豫农粳12，是粳型常规水稻，河南农业大学选育。其母本为“镇稻88”，父本为“方欣4号”。常规粳稻品种,全生育期4天。平均株高18.8cm,亩有效穗2.万,穗长1.cm,每穗总粒数18.3粒,结实率8.%,千粒重6.9g。该品种株型松散适中,长势繁茂,叶片绿色、挺直;半直立穗,谷粒椭圆形,有短芒。品质分析:21年检测:出糙率1.9%、精米率7.%、整精米率5.%、粒长5.1mm、长宽比.、垩白粒率7%、垩白度5.8%、直链淀粉6.2%、胶稠度6mm、碱消值5.5级、透明度1级、水分3.9%;07年检测:出糙率7.%、精米率6.7%、整精米率9.9%、粒长.mm、长宽比1.8、垩白粒率6%、垩白度7.9%、直链淀粉6.3%、胶稠度7mm、碱消值6级、透明度2级、水分1.7%。抗性鉴定:21年经江苏省农业科学院植物保护研究所鉴定:穗颈瘟损失指数级,稻瘟病综合抗性指数、中感稻瘟病(MS);对白叶枯病代表菌株浙7、KS-6-6和JS4-抗性表现为级、对PX7抗性表现为级;感纹枯病(S)。21年抗病鉴定:穗颈瘟损失指数级,稻瘟病综合抗性指数.5、中抗稻瘟病(MR);对白叶枯病代表菌株浙13、KS--和JS9-6、PX09抗性均表现为级;抗纹枯病(R)。
answer: 豫农粳12是河南农业大学选育的粳型常规水稻，母本为“镇稻88”，父本为“方欣4号”。其全生育期为4天，平均株高18.8cm，每穗总粒数18.3粒，千粒重6.9g。品质分析显示，其出糙率、精米率、整精米率、粒长、长宽比、垩白粒率、垩白度、直链淀粉、胶稠度、碱消值、透明度和水分等各项指标均有良好表现。在抗性鉴定方面，对穗颈瘟、稻瘟病、白叶枯病和纹枯病等病害均有一定的抗性。

question: 镇籼232，籼型常规水稻，江苏丘陵地区镇江农科所育成的中籼稻品种。该品种综合性状较好，株型集散适中，剑叶挺举，叶色稍深。株高110cm， 茎秆弹性较好，分蘖力较强。每穗总粒135粒左右，结实率90%左右，千粒重24.5g。米质较优。全生育期145天左右，后期转色较好。抗逆性较强，抗倒性好。抗白叶枯病，高抗稻瘟病和褐飞虱，纹桔病较轻。丰产性较好，省区域试验平均单产8012.55kg/hm2，比扬辐籼2号增产1.9%;省生产试验平均单产8598.6kg/hm2,比扬辐籼2号增5.98%。适宜在江苏淮南南部中籼稻地区中上等肥力条件下种植。

原材料：
{}

总结：
question: 春化作用一般是指植物必须经历一段时间的持续低温才能由营养生长阶段转入生殖阶段生长的现象。例如来自温带地区的耐寒花卉，较长的冬季和适度严寒，能更好的满足其春化阶段对低温的要求。低温处理对花卉促进开花的作用，因花卉的种类而异。春化低温对越冬植物成花的诱导和促进作用。冬性草本植物（如冬小麦）一般于秋季萌发，经过一段营养生长后度过寒冬，于第二年夏初开花结实。如果于春季播种，则只长茎、叶而不开花，或开花大大延迟。这是因为冬性植物需要经历一定时间的低温才能形成花芽。冬性作物已萌动的种子经过一定时间低温处理，则春播时也可以正常开花结实。春化作用一词即由此而来。冬性禾谷类作物（如冬小麦）；二年生作物（如甜菜、萝卜、大白菜）以及某些多年生草本植物（如牧草），都有春化现象，这是它们必须等到翌年才能开花的基本原因。而水稻的生长过程中无需春化作用。
answer: 春化作用是指植物需要经历一段低温期才能从营养生长阶段转为生殖阶段的现象。这种现象常见于冬性草本植物、二年生作物和某些多年生草本植物，如冬小麦、甜菜、萝卜等。这些植物在经历一段低温后，才能形成花芽并在第二年开花结实。而对于水稻等植物，其生长过程中则无需春化作用。

question: 传统的水稻育种方法主要依赖于自然变异和人工选择，包括系统育种、杂交育种、诱变育种等。这些方法不涉及对水稻基因组的直接操作。基因编辑（Gene Editing）是指通过基因编辑技术对生物体基因组特定目标进行修饰的过程。高效而精准的实现基因插入、缺失或替换，从而改变其遗传信息和表现型特征。基因编辑技术不属于传统的水稻育种方法。
answer: 传统的水稻育种方法主要依赖自然变异和人工选择，不涉及对基因组的直接操作。而基因编辑是通过技术对基因组特定目标进行修饰，实现基因插入、缺失或替换，改变其遗传信息和表现型特征，这不属于传统的水稻育种方法。

原材料：

总结：
question: 青海省地处青藏高原，属于高原大陆性气候。其气候特征是日照时间长、辐射强；冬季漫长、夏季凉爽；气温日较差大，年较差小；降水量少，地域差异大，东部雨水较多，西部干燥多风，缺氧、寒冷。青海省年平均气温受地形的影响，其总的分布形式是北高南低。青海省境内各地区年平均气温在-5.1℃～9.0℃之间，1月（最冷月）平均气温零下17.4℃～零下4.7℃，其中祁连托勒为最冷的地区；7月（最热月）平均气温在5.8℃～20.2℃之间，民和为最热的地区。年平均气温在0℃以下的祁连山区、青南高原面积占全省面积的2/3以上，较暖的东部湟水、黄河谷地、年平均气温在6℃～9℃。青海省年降水量总的分布趋势是由东南向西北逐渐减少，境内绝大部分地区年降水量在400毫米以下，祁连山区在410～520毫米之间，东南部的久治、班玛一带超过600毫米，其中久治为降水量最大的地区，年平均降水量达到745毫米；柴达木盆地年降水量在17～182毫米之间，盆地西北部少于50毫米，其中冷湖为降水最少的地区。由于气候、海拔、土壤、水资源以及气象灾害等多方面的限制，青海不适宜大规模种植水稻。尽管近年来有尝试在青海种植耐盐碱水稻（海水稻）的实验，但这仍然是在特定条件下的小规模尝试，并且需要克服许多技术难题。
answer: 青海省位于青藏高原，属于高原大陆性气候，特征为日照长、辐射强、冬季长、夏季凉、降水少且地域差异大。年平均气温在-5.1℃～9.0℃之间，受地形影响，总的分布形式是北高南低。年降水量由东南向西北逐渐减少，大部分地区年降水量在400毫米以下。由于气候、海拔、土壤、水资源等限制，青海不适宜大规模种植水稻，尽管有在特定条件下种植耐盐碱水稻的实验，但需克服许多技术难题。

总结：
question: 水稻喜高温、多湿、短日照，对土壤要求不严，水稻土最好。幼苗发芽最低温度10~12℃，最适28~32℃℃。分蘖期日均20℃以上,穗分化适温30℃左右;低温使枝梗和颖花分化延长。抽穗适温25~35℃。开花最适温30℃左右，低于20℃或高于40℃，受精受严重影响。相对湿度50~90%为宜。水稻为喜温作物。生物学零度粳稻为10℃、籼稻12℃，早稻三时期以前，日平均气温低于12℃三天以上易感染绵腐病，出现烂秧、死苗，后季稻秧苗温度高于40℃易受灼伤。日平均气温15~17℃以下时，分蘖停止，造成僵苗不发。花粉母细胞减数分裂期(幼小孢子阶段及减数分裂细线期)，最低温度低于15~17℃，会造成颖花退化，不实粒增加和抽穗延迟。抽穗开花期适宜温度为25~32℃℃(杂交稻25~30℃℃)当遇连续3天平均气温低于20℃(粳稻)或2~3天低于22℃(籼稻)，易形成空壳和谷，但气温在35~37℃以上(杂交稻32℃以上)造成结实率下降。灌浆结实期要求日平均气温在23~28℃之间，温度低时物质运转减慢，温度高时呼吸消耗增加。温度在13~15℃以下灌浆相当缓慢。粳稻比籼稻对低温更有适应性。由于高温条件下水稻光呼吸作用增强。其光合作用适宜温度范围较大，籼稻为25~35℃、粳稻为18~33℃，当籼稻低于20℃或高于40℃和粳稻低于15℃或高于38℃时，光合作用急剧减弱。稻根呼吸作用随温度升高至32℃时迅速加快，然后缓慢增加，至38℃时达最大值，接着减慢，而稻叶呼吸在20~44℃之间随温度升高呈直线增强。低温(尤其霜冻)情况下，光合效率受抑制，稻根吸水减少，导致气孔关闭和叶片枯萎。根呼吸对高温危害的反应比叶片更敏感。
answer: 水稻是一种喜欢高温、湿润、短日照的作物，对土壤要求不严，最适合的是水稻土。其生长过程中，温度对其影响较大，如发芽最适温度为28~32℃，分蘖期日均温度需在20℃以上，抽穗适温为25~35℃，开花最适温度为30℃。相对湿度应在50~90%之间。另外，水稻对低温和高温都敏感，过低或过高的温度都会影响其正常生长和繁殖。粳稻相比籼稻对低温有更好的适应性。光合作用的适宜温度范围较大，籼稻为25~35℃，粳稻为18~33℃。稻根和稻叶的呼吸作用也会随温度变化而变化。

question: 水稻种子包括种皮（有保护作用）、胚乳（储存营养物质）和胚（包括胚根、胚芽、胚轴、子叶）。水稻种子包括种皮（有保护作用）、胚乳（储存营养物质）和胚（包括胚根、胚芽、胚轴、子叶）。大米是稻谷经清理、碾米、成品整理等工序后制成的成品，这一过程中除去了种皮和胚（或部分胚），剩下胚乳。我们食用大米是为了获取营养物质，而水稻种子的营养成分就是储存在胚乳中。

原材料：
{}

总结：
question: 稻瘟病是水稻常见病害之一。稻瘟病又名稻热病、火烧瘟、叩头瘟等，是由稻瘟病原菌引起的、发生在水稻的一种病害。稻瘟病在水稻整个生育期中都可发生，为害秧苗、叶片、穗、节等，分别称为苗瘟、叶瘟、穗瘟和节瘟 [1]。稻瘟病分布遍及世界稻区，是稻作生产中的主要病害，其中以亚洲、非洲稻区发病为重。在中国地区一般山区重于平原，粳、糯重于籼稻，除华南稻区早稻重于晚稻外，其他稻区晚稻重于早稻。流行年份，一般减产10-20%，重的达40-50%，局部田块甚至颗粒无收 [1]。稻瘟病的防治方法主要有选用抗病品种，培育优质秧苗、肥水管理技术措施、加强田间管理、落实防治措施、化学药剂控制等。在稻瘟病流行以后，要切实掌握稻瘟病的发病症状、发病规律和发病原因，结合种植情况，采取科学可行的稻瘟病防治技术措施，树立起良好的预防理念，降低稻瘟病发生的可能性，避免给稻谷产量和质量造成损失。
answer: 稻瘟病是一种由稻瘟病原菌引起的水稻病害，可在水稻生育期任何阶段发生，影响秧苗、叶片、穗和节。该病害广泛分布于全球稻区，尤其在亚洲和非洲严重。在流行年份，可能导致产量下降10-50%。防治方法包括选用抗病品种，优化肥水管理，加强田间管理，实施防治措施，以及化学药剂控制。理解稻瘟病的发病症状、规律和原因，并采取科学的防治措施，可以降低病害发生的可能性，减少对稻谷产量和质量的损失。

总结：
question: 水稻穗为圆锥花序。水稻的穗是疏散型的圆锥花序，由多数小穗组成，每个小穗含有两朵不育花和一朵能育花。稻穗的穗轴基部是穗颈节所在部位，穗颈节以下的地方是穗颈。穗中轴作为主轴，即穗轴，在穗轴上大约生长着10个节，从节上长出来的分枝叫做一次枝梗，每个一次枝梗都是绕主穗轴生长。在一次枝梗基部的节上长出的是二次枝梗，小穗则着生在一次枝梗和二次枝梗上。

question: 依据水稻的生育期，播种期、生长期和成熟期，水稻可以分为早稻、中稻和晚稻。 一般早稻的生长期为90～120天，中稻为120～150天，晚稻为150～170天。早稻米一般腹白较大，硬质粒较少，米质疏松，品质较差，而晚稻米则反之，品质较好。早稻感光性迟钝或无感，被短日、高温缩短的营养生长期最短（23天），但营养生长性较晚稻稍大。晚稻感光性强，可被短日、高温缩短的营养生长期最长（74.2天），基本营养生长期最短，基本营养生长性也小。因此，一般说来，晚稻组的感光性与早稻相比更强。
answer: 水稻可以根据生育期分为早稻、中稻和晚稻。早稻的生长期为90～120天，米质较差；中稻生长期为120～150天；晚稻生长期为150～170天，米质较好。早稻对光照的感应性较弱，而晚稻的感光性强。

Summary:
question: To analyze the salt-tolerant phenotypes of SR86 and Nipponbare (Nip), SR86 and Nip rice were treated with different concentrations of salt. In the 150 mM NaCl treatment, SR86 plants showed a survival rate of 70%, while Nip showed no survival (Fig. 1A–D). To mine the salt tolerance-related genes in SR86, 30 extremely salt-tolerant and 30 extremely salt-sensitive plants were selected from the F(2) progeny of the SR86 × Nip cross, and mixed bulks were generated. BSA-seq analysis revealed salt tolerance related candidate region on chromosome 4, chromosome 8 and chromosome 12 (Fig. 1E). Based on the threshold line, chromosome 4 was judged to have the relevant to the target trait (Fig. 1E). Functional annotation analysis revealed that this region contained a putative salt stress-related gene, LOC_Os04g03320. Real-time quantitative PCR (RT-qPCR) analysis suggested that the expression level of LOC_Os04g03320 was significantly higher in SR86 than that in Nip in the 150 mM NaCl treatment (Fig. 1F). Therefore, we selected LOC_Os04g03320 as the candidate salt tolerance-related gene. Because the protein encoded by this gene was a JRLs protein, we named this gene as OsJRL45.
answer: A study was conducted to analyze the salt-tolerance in SR86 and Nipponbare (Nip) rice. SR86 showed a 70% survival rate under 150 mM NaCl treatment, while Nip showed no survival. BSA-seq analysis of the F(2) progeny of the SR86 × Nip cross identified a candidate region on chromosomes 4, 8, and 12 related to salt tolerance. Further analysis revealed a putative salt stress-related gene, LOC_Os04g03320, on chromosome 4. This gene, which showed higher expression levels in SR86 than in Nip under 150 mM NaCl treatment, was selected as the candidate salt tolerance-related gene and named OsJRL45.

Source Material:

Summary:
question: The ability of seeds to germinate under high salinity conditions is an important indicator of salt tolerance [53]. Germination experiments were performed using the seeds of WT plants, Osjrl45 mutant lines (KO1 and KO2), and OsJRL45-OE lines (OE1 and OE2) under control (0 mM NaCl) and salt treatments (100 and 200 mM NaCl) (Fig. 4C–E). Under normal conditions, the WT, KO1, KO2, OE1, and OE2 genotypes showed no difference in the seed germination rate and seedling growth (Fig. 4C). In the presence of 100 mM NaCl, compared with the WT, the shoot and root lengths of knockout mutants seedlings were significantly reduced, while those of overexpression lines seedlings were significantly increased (Fig. 4C-E). Under 200 mM NaCl stress, the KO1 and KO2 lines showed seed germination but almost no seedling growth (Fig. 4C-E).Next, we analyzed the salt tolerance of WT and all knockout and overexpressed transgenic rice at the seedling period. Under normal conditions, the WT, KO1, KO2, OE1, and OE2 genotypes showed no difference (Fig. 5A). Under salt stress, the knockout plants indicated severe wilting, while the overexpressed plants grew better than WT plants (Fig. 5A). The chlorophyll content, fresh weights and dry weights of KO1 and KO2 plants were significantly lower after treatment than before treatment, while the chlorophyll contents of OE1 and OE2 plants were lower and their fresh weights and dry weights were significantly higher (Fig. 5C-E). The survival rates (Fig. 5B), chlorophyll contents (Fig. 5C), fresh weights (Fig. 5D), and dry weights (Fig. 5E) of knockout plants seedlings were significantly lower than those of the WT plants, while those of overexpressed transgenic rice seedlings were higher under salinity stress treatments. Collectively, these results suggest that OsJRL45 positively regulates salt tolerance at the germination and seedling stages.To elucidate its biological function, the OsJRL45 gene isolated from SR86 was transformed into the salt-sensitive indica cultivar L6-23. The promoter of OsJRL45 was cloned into the pCAMBIA1300 vector, and the resultant construct was transformed into L6-23 via Agrobacterium-mediated transformation to create transgenic rice (named Lh). The L6-23 plants suggested severe wilting, while the Lh plants grew better than the L6-23 rice under salt stress (Fig. 7A). RT-qPCR results indicated that the expression level of OsJRL45 was significantly higher in Lh transgenic rice than in L6-23 plants (Fig. 7B). Compared with the L6-23 plants, the survival rate (Fig. 7C) and chlorophyll content (Fig. 7D) of Lh plants were significantly higher under salt stress conditions.
answer: Experiments on seed germination under high salinity conditions found that the OsJRL45 gene positively regulates salt tolerance in rice at the germination and seedling stages. Under normal conditions, there was no difference in germination rate and seedling growth between wild-type (WT) plants and Osjrl45 mutant and overexpression lines. However, under salt stress, knockout mutants showed reduced shoot and root lengths and severe wilting, while overexpression lines showed increased lengths and better growth. The gene was then isolated and transformed into a salt-sensitive rice cultivar, resulting in significantly higher survival rates and chlorophyll content under salt stress conditions.

question:
the near isogenic line (NIL) of a rice QTL
simultaneously controlling plant height, heading date, and the number of grains per panicle on chromosome 8 (referred to as Ghd8) was obtained within an F7 inbred line following a trait-performance-derived NIL strategy; the male parent HR5 allele contributed to delayed heading, tall culms, and large panicles (Zhang et al., 2006). Summary:
question: Ghd8 is expressed at a low level in all organs at different developmental stages, like OsHAP3H (namely Ghd8 in this study), whose expression was too low to be detected by RT–PCR in the tissues investigated (Thirumurugan et al., 2008). However, three OsHAP3 genes were highly expressed in all tested organs at different developmental stages. One gene (Loc_OS02g49410) showed preferential expression in the panicle and endosperm (Supplemental Figure 1). These findings indicated that different members of the OsHAP3 family have different functions in the rice lifecycle. To check the spatio-temporal expression of Ghd8 under LD conditions, RNA in situ hybridization was performed with roots, young leaves, stems, and young panicles of NILHR5. Ghd8 was highly expressed in the phloem of leaves, the vascular system of the stem, and especially in cells of the inflorescence meristem. The inflorescence meristem formed bracts and inflorescence branches (Itoh et al., 2005), which probably determined panicle size (Supplemental Figure 2).
answer: Ghd8, also known as OsHAP3H, is expressed at low levels in all organs at different developmental stages in rice. Other OsHAP3 genes show higher expression in all tested organs, with one gene showing preferential expression in the panicle and endosperm. Ghd8 is highly expressed in the phloem of leaves, the vascular system of the stem, and in cells of the inflorescence meristem, which may determine panicle size. These findings suggest that different members of the OsHAP3 family have different functions in the rice lifecycle.

Summary:
question: To test this prediction, we introduced both Ghd8 alleles of 93–11 (Ghd8 (93–11)) and Nipponbare (Ghd8(Nip)) by Agrobacterium-mediated transformation into NILZS, which has a small panicle, short stature, and early heading compared to NILHR5. The T1 families of the T0 transformants containing a single-copy of the Ghd8 (93–11) and (Ghd8 (Nip)) alleles were analyzed for their phenotypic effects under natural LD conditions (13–14-h day length). The positive T1 plants showed significantly more grains, delayed heading and taller culms compared to the transgenic negative plants (Figure 1). The negative Ghd8 transgenic plants (NILZS–) showed a performance similar to their recipient line NILZS in heading date, grain yield, grains per panicle, and plant height (Table 1). On average, a positive T1 plant (NIL93–11+/NILNip+) resulted in increases above 60% in grain yield per plant and grains per panicle compared to the recipient NILZS and the negative T1 plant (NILZS–) (Figure 1). The NILNip+ plant showed a performance similar to that of the NIL carrying the HR5 homozygotes (NILHR5) in grain yield, grains per panicle, and plant height; however, the transformants with the Ghd8 (93–11) allele were delayed in flowering by 9 d, thus indicating the strong effect of the 93–11 allele on heading date (Table 1). In summary, the complementary test confirmed that the candidate gene was in fact Ghd8.When compared to ZS97, ZS97Nip flowered earlier and later under SD and LD conditions, respectively (Table 2). That is to say, the Ghd8 allele of Nipponbare promoted flowering under SD conditions and inhibited flowering under LD conditions in ZS97. We also compared the diurnal expression of OsMADS51 (Kim et al., 2008) under SD conditions, that of OsMADS50 under LD conditions and that of OsGI, Hd1, Ehd1, Hd3a, and RFT1 under both conditions between positive and negative transgenic plants (ZS97Nip+ and ZS97Nip–). There was no difference in diurnal expression for OsGI, OsMADS51, OsMADS50, and Hd1, but a distinct difference was observed for Ehd1, Hd3a and RFT1 between ZS97Nip+ and ZS97Nip– (Figure 3A and 3B). These results indicated that Ghd8 acts upstream of Ehd1, Hd3a, and RFT1.
answer: A study introduced Ghd8 alleles into NILZS, a plant with small panicles, short stature, and early heading. Under natural long-day conditions, T1 plants with these alleles showed more grains, delayed heading, and taller culms compared to transgenic negative plants. The NILNip+ plant showed similar performance to the NIL carrying the HR5 homozygotes in grain yield, grains per panicle, and plant height, but the Ghd8 (93–11) allele delayed flowering by 9 days. This confirmed that the candidate gene was Ghd8. The Ghd8 allele of Nipponbare promoted flowering under short-day conditions and inhibited it under long-day conditions. Differences in diurnal expression for Ehd1, Hd3a, and RFT1 were observed between positive and negative transgenic plants, indicating that Ghd8 acts upstream of these genes.

Summary:
question: To determine the temporal and spatial expression patterns of TAC4, we introduced a construct, consisting of a 2175-bp TAC4 promoter fused to the GUS reporter gene, into the japonica cultivar Nipponbare. GUS staining of the transgenic plants indicated that TAC4 was expressed in almost all the organs, including root, culm, leaf sheath, tiller base and young panicle (Figure 3a–j). Consistent with the GUS staining data, a quantitative real-time PCR analysis also showed that TAC4 was ubiquitously expressed in various rice organs, with the most abundant expression occurring in the young panicle, lamina joint, leaf sheath pulvinus and internode (Figure 3k). TAC4 mRNA in situ hybridization showed that a high TAC4 transcript abundance could be detected in the axillary and shoot apical meristem at the tillering stage (Figure 3l–o). RNA-sequencing data showed TAC4 transcripts in both the lower and upper sides of tiller bases, and the expression levels were similar (Figure S5). The high expression of TAC4 was also detected in the tiller base during the whole growth period (Figure S6). This TAC4 expression pattern is consistent with its role in the control of tiller angle.
answer: A study on the expression patterns of TAC4 in the japonica cultivar Nipponbare revealed that TAC4 is expressed in almost all organs, including root, culm, leaf sheath, tiller base and young panicle. The most abundant expression was found in the young panicle, lamina joint, leaf sheath pulvinus and internode. High TAC4 transcript abundance was detected in the axillary and shoot apical meristem at the tillering stage. TAC4 transcripts were also found in both the lower and upper sides of tiller bases, with similar expression levels. The high expression of TAC4 was detected in the tiller base throughout the growth period, aligning with its role in controlling tiller angle.

Summary:
question: The TAC4 gene was predicted to encode a novel protein. To elucidate the cellular localization of the TAC4 protein, we fused green fluorescence protein (GFP) to the C termini of TAC4 and tac4. The fluorescent signal of the TAC4-GFP fusion was detected in the nuclei of rice leaf protoplasts (Figure 3p) and in the roots of transgenic plant (Figure 3q), suggesting that the TAC4 protein may function in the nucleus. The fluorescent signal of tac4-GFP was also detected in the nucleus (Figure 3p). Thus, the loss of 135 residues from the C terminus of TAC4 resulted in the protein’s loss of function, yet it did not change the cellular localization.
answer: The TAC4 gene is predicted to encode a novel protein. Experiments using a green fluorescence protein (GFP) fused to TAC4 and tac4 showed that both proteins are localized in the nucleus of rice leaf protoplasts and roots of transgenic plants. Despite losing 135 residues from its C terminus, the tac4 protein maintained its nuclear localization, although it lost its function.

Summary:
question: The function of LOC_Os02g25230 was further confirmed by genetic transformation. All the transgenic plants overexpressing the full-length coding sequence of LOC_Os02g25230 (derived from IL55) in the tac4-mutant background displayed the small tiller angle phenotype, similar to IL55 (Figure 2b–e). Using RNA interference (RNAi), we generated LOC_Os02g25230 knockdown plants in the japonica cultivar Nipponbare background. The RNAi transgenic plants exhibited greater tiller angles compared with control plants, indicating that the decreased expression of LOC_Os02g25230 significantly increased tiller angle (Figure 2f–h). Therefore, we concluded that LOC_Os02g25230 corresponds to the TAC4 gene and that the expression level of TAC4 was negatively correlated with tiller angle.the introgression line IL55 harbouring the tac1 allele (Aida et al., 1997), which displays an extremely compact tiller angle in the indica rice variety IR24 background, was mutagenized with ethyl methane sulphonate to generate a mutant library for screening plants with large tiller angles. One such mutant, tac4, was identified. During both the vegetative and reproductive stages, tac4 always exhibited a greater tiller angle than IL55 (Figure 1a and b, and Figure S1), and at the heading stage, the tiller angle was ~13.2° in the tac4 mutant, while it was only ~5.2° in the IL55 (Figure 1c and d). The heights of tac4 plants were reduced ~20% compared with those of IL55 and mainly resulted from the shortened uppermost internode (Figure S2a–c). Observations of longitudinal sections of the uppermost internode revealed that cell lengths were significantly decreased in tac4, indicating that the decreased cell elongation could be the main cause of the reduced tac4 plant height (Figure S2d). We found that the panicle length was shorter, and the primary and secondary branches and the grain number per panicle were significantly reduced, compared with IL55 (Table S1). The grain length of tac4 was shorter than that of IL55, and the mean 1000-grain weight was less (Figure S3). These observations suggest that TAC4 is pleiotropic, regulating multiple important agronomic traits.
answer: The function of the gene LOC_Os02g25230, also known as TAC4, was confirmed through genetic transformation. When overexpressed in transgenic plants, it resulted in a small tiller angle phenotype, similar to IL55. Conversely, when its expression was decreased through RNA interference, the tiller angle increased. This indicates that TAC4 expression is negatively correlated with tiller angle. Additionally, the tac4 mutant exhibited a greater tiller angle, reduced plant height due to decreased cell elongation, and shorter panicle length, with fewer branches and grains per panicle compared to IL55. The study suggests that TAC4 is pleiotropic, regulating multiple important agronomic traits.

Summary:
question: AtHCAR is a key enzyme in the PAO/phyllobilin pathway for Chl degradation; it catalyzes the conversion of 7-HMC a to Chl a in vivo and in vitro, and the athcar mutant shows a stay-green phenotype during DIS (Meguro et al., 2011). In this study, we found that, like the athcar mutant, the oshcar mutant exhibits persistent leaf greenness much longer than wild type during DIS and natural senescence (Fig. 1; Supplementary Fig. 2), along with the accumulation of 7-HMC a and Pheo a (Fig. 2). Furthermore, overexpressing OsHCAR recovered the defects of the athcar mutant (Supplementary Fig. 4), strongly indicating that OsHCAR is a functional homolog of AtHCAR.
answer: AtHCAR is an enzyme crucial for Chl degradation, and its mutation results in a stay-green phenotype. The study found that the oshcar mutant, like the athcar mutant, exhibits prolonged leaf greenness during DIS and natural senescence, with an accumulation of 7-HMC a and Pheo a. Overexpressing OsHCAR corrected the athcar mutant defects, suggesting that OsHCAR is a functional homolog of AtHCAR.

question: The agronomic traits of the OE and T-DNA insertion lines were evaluated (Fig. 2E, F). Summary:
question: To test if ABF1V suppresses flowering through downregulation of Ehd1 expression, we generated 12 and 18 Pubi:Ehd1-Flag transgenic lines in wild-type background (Ehd1-OX)and ABF1V-1 background (Ehd1-OX/ ABF1V), respectively. Among them, 8 Ehd1-OX and 11 Ehd1-OX/ABF1V lines at T1 generation were flowering earlier than wild type under NDs (two representative lines of each genotype were shown in Fig. 4, A and B), demonstrating that overexpression of Ehd1 can efficiently suppress the later flowering phenotype of ABF1V.To measure and compare the flowering times between Ehd1OXand Ehd1-OX/ABF1V, two independent lines of each genotype expressing equal levels of Ehd1-Flag protein were selected for the investigation (Fig. 4C). The results showed that Ehd1-OX/ABF1V lines were flowering about 4 d later than Ehd1-OX lines grown in NDs. This slight flowering difference might be due to the dosage effect of Ehd1 mRNA, because the transcription of endogenous Ehd1 was suppressed in Ehd1-OX/ABF1V but not in Ehd1-OX. Alternatively, ABF1V may not repress flowering in a manner entirely dependent on the Ehd1 pathway. Furthermore, we tested if ABF1E accelerates flowering through enhancing Ehd1 expression. In total, 18 and 15 Ehd1-RNAi transgenic lines in wild-type background (Ehd1R)and ABF1E-1 background (Ehd1RNAi/ABF1E) were generated, respectively. Among them, 15 Ehd1R and 12 Ehd1R/ABF1E lines at T1 generation were similarly flowering later than wild type under NDs (two representative lines of each genotype were shown in Supplemental Fig. S4), demonstrating that knockdown of Ehd1 can efficiently suppress the early flowering phenotype of ABF1E. Taken together, our molecular and genetic results support the hypothesis that OsABF1 regulates flowering time through the Ehd1mediated flowering pathway.demonstrating that OsABF1-RNAi attenuates drought delay of flowering. Together, these results suggested that OsABF1 and OsbZIP40 function redundantly in mediating drought inhibition of flowering through the Ehd1 pathway.
answer: The study tested the role of ABF1V in suppressing flowering through downregulation of Ehd1 expression. Transgenic lines were created in both wild-type and ABF1V-1 backgrounds, with results showing that overexpression of Ehd1 can suppress the later flowering phenotype of ABF1V. However, Ehd1-OX/ABF1V lines flowered about 4 days later than Ehd1-OX lines, suggesting that ABF1V may not entirely repress flowering through the Ehd1 pathway. The study also tested if ABF1E accelerates flowering through enhancing Ehd1 expression. Transgenic lines were created in both wild-type and ABF1E-1 backgrounds, with results showing that knockdown of Ehd1 can suppress the early flowering phenotype of ABF1E. The results support the hypothesis that OsABF1 regulates flowering time through the Ehd1-mediated flowering pathway.

Summary:
question: To analyze the genetic basis for the late flowering time of wild rice, we constructed an F2 population derived from crosses between YIL79 and Teqing. All of the F1 progeny exhibited late flowering (145 ± 2.8 d) under long-day conditions, which was similar to that of the introgression line YIL79. In one F2 population with 1000 plants, the ratio of plants exhibiting late flowering (759) to plants exhibiting normal flowering (241) was 3:1. These results indicate that this late heading trait is controlled by a single dominant gene, referred to as Late Heading Date 1 (LHD1)
answer: A study on the genetic basis for late flowering in wild rice used an F2 population derived from YIL79 and Teqing crosses. All F1 progeny showed late flowering similar to YIL79. In an F2 population of 1000 plants, the ratio of late to normal flowering plants was 3:1, indicating a single dominant gene, Late Heading Date 1 (LHD1), controls this trait.

Summary:
question: LHD1 is a key gene controlling heading date, which has been confirmed by a series of genetic evidence. To elaborate the role of LHD1in the rice flowering pathway, we examined the expression levels of LHD1 and other heading date genes (OsGI, OsMADS50, OsMADS51, Hd1, Ehd1, Hd3a, RFT1) in both YIL79 and Teqing under long-day and short-day conditions, respectively. We found that no difference in the LHD1 expression levels could be detected between YIL79 and Teqing under both long-day and short-day conditions, respectively, suggesting that late flowering did not result from the LHD1 transcript. For OsGI, OsMADS50, OsMADS51, Hd1, no difference could be detected under long-day and short-day conditions between YIL79 and Teqing. The expression levels of Ehd1, Hd3a and RFT1 were less in YIL79 than those in Teqing under long-day conditions, but not under short-day conditions, indicating that LHD1 may suppress the expressions of these floral transition activators (Figure 4).
answer: The LHD1 gene is crucial in controlling the heading date in rice, as confirmed by genetic evidence. Studies of LHD1 and other heading date genes under different day-length conditions revealed no difference in LHD1 expression levels between two rice varieties, YIL79 and Teqing, suggesting that late flowering is not due to LHD1. The expression levels of Ehd1, Hd3a, and RFT1 were found to be lower in YIL79 under long-day conditions, indicating that LHD1 may suppress these floral transition activators.

Summary:
question: a newly identified QTL, DTH8 (QTL for days to heading on chromosome 8), was found to regulate these three traits in rice. Map-based cloning reveals that DTH8 encodes a putative HAP3 subunit of the CCAAT-box-binding transcription factor and the complementary experiment increased significantly days to heading, plant height, and number of grains per panicle in CSSL61 (a chromosome segment substitution line that carries the nonfunctional DTH8 allele) with the Asominori functional DTH8 allele under long-day conditions. DTH8 is expressed in most tissues and its protein is localized to the nucleus exclusively. The quantitative real-time PCR assay revealed that DTH8 could down-regulate the transcriptions of Ehd1 (for Early heading date1) and Hd3a (for Heading date3a; a rice ortholog of FLOWERING LOCUS T) under long-day conditions. Ehd1 and Hd3a can also be down-regulated by the photoperiodic flowering genes Ghd7 and Hd1 (a rice ortholog of CONSTANS).
answer: A newly identified QTL, DTH8, has been found to regulate days to heading, plant height, and number of grains per panicle in rice. DTH8 encodes a putative HAP3 subunit of the CCAAT-box-binding transcription factor and is expressed in most tissues, with its protein localized exclusively to the nucleus. DTH8 can down-regulate the transcriptions of Ehd1 and Hd3a under long-day conditions, and these genes can also be down-regulated by the photoperiodic flowering genes Ghd7 and Hd1.

Summary:
question: To examine whether the expression of DTH8 is influenced by Hd1 and Ghd7, DTH8 expression was examined in Hd1 and Ghd7 near-isogenic lines (NILs) grown for 40 d under LD conditions. As shown in Figure 6A and Supplemental Figure S7A, the expression levels of DTH8 and Ghd7, compared with those in Nipponbare, were not changed in NIL (hd1) grown under LD conditions. However, Ehd1 and Hd3a were suppressed by Hd1 in Nipponbare. Similarly, no changes were found in the levels of DTH8 and Hd1 mRNA in the Ghd7 NILs under LD conditions. But the expressions of Ehd1 and Hd3a were also suppressed by Ghd7 (Fig. 6B; Supplemental Fig. S7B). These results indicate that DTH8 suppresses rice flowering by down-regulating the expression of Ehd1 and Hd3a, and that the expression of DTH8, Hd1,or Ghd7 is independent of each other under LD conditions.. Meanwhile, the differences between DTH8 and Ghd7 were also very obvious. Tiller number in Ghd7 NILs with functional or nonfunctional alleles differed from each other (Xue et al., 2008); those between Asominori and CSSL61 are the same (Fig. 1; Supplemental Tables S2 and S3). Ghd7 regulates the height through total cell number in the y axes of internodes and it also influences culm thickness, whereas DTH8 regulates height by altering cell elongation in the internodes, but keeps culm thickness stable (Fig. 7).
answer: The study examined the expression of DTH8 in relation to Hd1 and Ghd7 in near-isogenic lines (NILs) of rice under long day (LD) conditions. The results showed that DTH8 expression was not influenced by Hd1 and Ghd7, but it suppressed the expression of Ehd1 and Hd3a, thereby delaying rice flowering. Additionally, DTH8 and Ghd7 were found to regulate plant height differently, with Ghd7 influencing cell number and culm thickness, and DTH8 affecting cell elongation while maintaining culm thickness.

Summary:
question: early flowering 8 (ef8) selected from an ethyl methanesulfonate (EMS)-treated population of indica cultivar 93-11. It showed earlier flowering, less grains per main panicle and slightly darker green leaves than the wildtype 93-11 under natural long-day conditions, but was not significantly different from 93-11 under natural short-day conditions. We isolated the Early Flowering 8 (EF8) gene by map-based cloning. EF8 encodes a putative HAP3 subunit of the CCAAT-box-binding transcription factor, which is localized to the nucleus.Using 452 recessive early-flowering individuals selected from this population, the EF8 gene was mapped to a 38 kb genomic region between markers Fm45 and Fm31 and co-segregated with Fm40 (Fig. 3A). This region contains six open reading frames (ORFs; http://www.gramene.org/; Fig. 2a). All of these genes were sequenced in the ef8 mutant and wild type, and by comparison we found that only the sixth ORF (Loc_Os08g07740) was changed, with a one base deletion at position 323 bp from the start codon in the ef8 mutant; this caused a frame-shift and premature termination of translation (Fig. 3b,c; Supplemental Fig. S2). In addition, ef8 mutation included 9 bp deletion and 6 bp insertion (Fig. 3b; Supplemental Fig. S2).
answer: The early flowering 8 (ef8) gene was identified in the indica cultivar 93-11, which exhibited earlier flowering and fewer grains per main panicle under long-day conditions. The EF8 gene, which encodes a putative HAP3 subunit of the CCAAT-box-binding transcription factor, was isolated through map-based cloning. The gene was found to be located in a 38 kb genomic region and was the only gene with a change in the ef8 mutant compared to the wild type. This change was a one base deletion, causing a frame-shift and premature termination of translation. The ef8 mutation also included a 9 bp deletion and 6 bp insertion.

Summary:
question:
Two independent floral regulators, Hd1 and Ehd1,control flowering through regulating Hd3a and RFT1 in rice (Izawa 2007; Tsuji et al. 2011). To investigate whether the alteration of expression patterns of the two ‘florigen’ genes by EF8 is mediated by Hd1, Ehd1 or other regulators of Hd1 and Ehd1, such as OsMADS51, OsMADS50 and OsGI (Hayama et al. 2003; Kim et al. 2007; Lee et al. 2010), we examined their mRNA levels between wild type and the ef8 mutant under LDs and SDs. Under LDs, to our surprise, no significant differences in the expression of any of these genes were detected between ef8 mutant and wild type (Fig. 5a). Under SDs, the expression pattern of Ehd1 was slightly changed in ef8 mutant compared to wild type, but the expression patterns of other genes were not changed (Fig. 5b). Together, these results indicated that EF8 delayed flowering through altering the rhythmic expression patterns of the ‘florigen’ genes Hd3a and RFT1 independently of Hd1 and Ehd1 under LDs.
The ef8 mutant displayed a slightly darker green leaf phenotype and more chlorophyll content compared to wild type under LDs (Fig. 2; Supplemental Fig. S1), which suggested that EF8 may have effect on chlorophyll biogenesis. To test this, we extracted total RNAs from 30-dayold leaves of wild-type and ef8 mutant seedlings under both LDs and SDs, and performed QRT-PCR to examine the expression of genes encoding the enzymes in the chlorophyll biosynthetic pathway in rice. Most of these genes were up-regulated to different degrees except chlorophyll synthetase (CHLG)in ef8 mutant compared to wild type under LDs (Fig. 6a). For example, Mg-protoporphyrin IX methyltransferase (CHLM) and NADPH:protochlorophyllide oxidoreductase A (PORA) were up-regulated more than threefold, and Mg chelatase H subunit (CHLH) and divinyl reductase (DVR) about twofold. However, there were no significant differences in the transcription level of these genes under SDs (Fig. 6b). This result indicated that the higher chlorophyll content was due to higher expression levels of chlorophyll biosynthetic genes in the ef8 mutant compared to wild type and EF8 negatively regulated chlorophyll biogenesis under LDs.
answer: The study investigates the role of EF8 in the regulation of flowering and chlorophyll biogenesis in rice. It was found that EF8 alters the rhythmic expression patterns of the 'florigen' genes Hd3a and RFT1, independently of the floral regulators Hd1 and Ehd1 under long-day conditions (LDs). The ef8 mutant also showed a darker green leaf phenotype and higher chlorophyll content compared to wild type under LDs, due to the up-regulation of most chlorophyll biosynthetic genes. This suggests that EF8 negatively regulates chlorophyll biogenesis under LDs.

Summary:
question: Compared with the wild type, the grain length of wbg1 was unchanged, but grain width and thickness were significantly decreased (Figure 1B). The filling rate of wbg1 grains across the whole filling period was lower than that in the wild type, and the thousand-grain weight of wbg1 mature seeds was also decreased (Figures 1C, D). Despite these changes, there is no significant difference in plant height. The mutation results in a white belly phenotype in mature grains.

The evaluation was based on the percentage of purple seedlings in the germination experiment with the two F1 populations. The results showed that the outcrossing seed setting rate, represented by the percentage of purple seedlings, was 9.47% in the Nipponbare (OsSYL2CC) and purple rice combination.

Summary:
question:
We isolated a rice bglu6 mutant (04Z11IG62) with a T-DNA insertion in the sixth intron of the gene (Fig. 1a). Molecular analysis revealed that this T-DNA insertion resulted in no detectable expression ofBGLU6in leaves and roots (Fig. S1a,b). Phenotypic analysis showed that disruption of BGLU6 led to a 46.2% and 66.9% decrease in seedling plant height compared to the WT, at 7 and 14 d post-transplantation, respectively (Figs 1b, S1c,d). The dwarf phenotype was present throughout the entire growth and development stages (Figs 1b, S1c,d). By contrast, no difference was seen in root length of bglu6compared to the WT root length (data not shown). To confirm the role ofBGLU6on plant height, we generated bglu6 RE and OE transgenic rice lines by introducing an Ubiquitin-driven construct harboring BGLU6 (Fig. S2a). The plant height ofBGLU6RE lines were 93.2% that of the WT, indicating a nearly complete restoration of height through expression of BGLU6 in the mutant. BGLU6OE lines had a plant height of 120.5% of the WT (Fig. S2b,c). Likewise, no obvious difference was seen in root length and weight between these genotypes (data not shown). b-glucosidases have been reported to hydrolyze inactive ABAGE, and result in an increase in the endogenous ABA concentration. To investigate if the dwarfism is related to cellular ABA concentration, we examined the endogenous ABA content in leaves of the WT and the bglu6mutant at the seedling stage. ABA content in bglu6was 68.2% that of the WT (Fig. 1c). We also examined leafGA3 content and no difference was seen between the WT and the bglu6mutant (Fig. 1c), suggesting the enzyme is specific for hydrolysis of ABA-GE. Furthermore, spraying 10 lMABA onto bglu6leaves partly restored the plant height ofbglu6(Fig. 1d). Taken together, these results indicate that disruption of BGLU6 affects ABA concentration in leaves, resulting in a dwarfism in the mutant.
Under normal conditions, the hydrolysis activity ofABA-GE in the OE-5 line was 22.6% higher than that of the WT (Fig. 2c). After 2 d of drought stress, the hydrolysis activity in the WT and the OE-5 line was increased to 121% and 105% of activity before the treatment (Fig. 2c). Taken together, these results clearly demonstrate that BGLU6 hydrolyzes ABA-GE to ABA in vitro, and that this activity can be enhanced by drought stress.
Of the downregulated DEGs, seven were related to stress. Of these, heat shock protein 81-2 (OS09G0482100), SPX domaincontaining protein (OS02G0202200) and embryonic abundant protein (OS05G0349800) were downregulated the most (Table S4). Four DEGs that participate in photosynthesis were identified, with ribulose bisphosphate carboxylase large chain (OS01G0791033), ATP synthase subunit beta, chloroplastic (OS10G0355800) downregulated the most (Table S3). Besides these, we also found that positive regulation of abscisic acid biosynthesis process (GO0010116) was significantly enriched in the DEGs. The expression patterns of these DEGs were confirmed by q-RT-PCR analysis (Fig. S5). Taken together, the above results suggest that disruption of BGLU6 affects chloroplastic oxidative stress and lowers the photosynthesis efficiency, even under normal condition.
Because disruption of BGLU6 resulted in a decrease in endogenous ABA concentrations in leaves, and BGLU6 was localized to the chloroplast, we examined the stomatal characteristics of WT, bglu6, RE and OE lines in leaves. Under normal conditions, bglu6had significantly increased stomatal density, at 157.5% that of the WT. The increased stomatal density could be restored by expressing BGLU6 in the mutant, whereas in the OE line the density was not significantly different from that of the WT (Fig. 6a,c). After drought stress, stomatal density was slightly higher in these genotypes compared to that before treatment, except in the OE line, which had equivalent stomatal densities to those before stress (Fig. 6a,c). Taken together, these results indicate that disruption ofBGLU6affects stomatal density in leaves.
answer: A study isolated a rice bglu6 mutant with a T-DNA insertion that resulted in no detectable expression of BGLU6 in leaves and roots. This mutation led to a significant decrease in seedling plant height, but had no effect on root length. The researchers generated transgenic rice lines to confirm BGLU6's role in plant height, and found that reintroducing BGLU6 nearly restored the mutant's height. The study also found that the mutation affected the ABA concentration in leaves, resulting in dwarfism. Under drought stress, BGLU6 hydrolysis activity increased. The mutation also affected chloroplastic oxidative stress and photosynthesis efficiency. Additionally, the mutation resulted in increased stomatal density in leaves, which could be restored by expressing BGLU6 in the mutant.

Summary:
question: Many of the GH3 genes in Arabidopsis, soybean, and tobacco were found to be differentially expressed in different tissues or in response to exogenous auxin and light stimuli (Tepperman et al. 2001; Hagen and Guilfoyle 2002; Tanaka et al. 2002; Takase et al. 2004). To determine the organ-specific expression pattern of each OsGH3 gene, real-time PCR was performed with total RNA isolated from etiolated shoots, green shoots, roots, flowers, and callus. This analysis revealed that OsGH3 genes are differentially expressed in various tissues/organs (Fig. 6a). The transcription of OsGH3-12 was found to be root-specific and was hardly detectable in other tissues examined (Fig. 6a). However, OsGH3-10 was found to be expressed at very low levels in all the tissues. In contrast, other OsGH3 genes were found to be expressed in almost all the tissues examined but at different levels.Also, significant differences were found in the transcript abundance ofOsGH3 genes in etiolated and green shoots (Fig. 6a)
answer: The GH3 genes in Arabidopsis, soybean, and tobacco are differentially expressed in various tissues and in response to auxin and light stimuli. A study using real-time PCR on RNA from different parts of the plant revealed that OsGH3 genes also show differential expression in different tissues. Specifically, OsGH3-12 was found to be root-specific, while OsGH3-10 had low expression in all tissues. Other OsGH3 genes were expressed in almost all tissues but at varying levels. There were also notable differences in the transcript abundance of OsGH3 genes in etiolated and green shoots.

Summary:
question:
knockout lines (KO-GL10) harbored a frameshift mutation that caused premature termination of translation (Fig. S4A and S4B). These KO-GL10 lines exhibited significantly decreased grain length, grain width, and 1000-grain weight compared to those of the HJX74 wild-type line (Fig. 2A, 2C, 2D, 2E). In addition, heading date differed significantly between KO-GL10 and HJX74 (Fig. S4C), although we found no detectable differences in plant height, effective tiller numbers, or grain number (Fig. S4DeS4F). We also generated a genetic complementation construct for GL10 overexpression in the NIL-gl10 background via transformation with a p35S-GL10 vector (Fig. S5A and S5B). The GL10 overexpression lines exhibited significantly increased grain length and grain weight compared to that of NIL-gl10 (Fig. 2B, 2F, 2G, 2H). Moreover, OE-GL10 grain phenotypes were distinct from that of KO-GL10 plants, with grain length and heading date positively correlating with GL10 expression level. Notably, the heading stage of OE-GL10 was earlier than that of NIL-gl10 (Fig. S5C). In addition, we found no significant differences between OE-GL10 and NIL-gl10 in grain width, plant height, effective tiller numbers, and grain number per plant (Fig. S5DeS5F). These results indicate that GL10 was a positive regulator of grain length, grain weight and heading date.
overexpression of GL10 results in increased grain length and weight and earlier heading date. GL10 regulates grain length by promoting greater longitudinal cell growth in the grain glume. Additionally, GL10 participates in the regulation of gibberellic acid (GA) signaling pathway genes in young panicle tissues. Analysis of GL10 haplotypes shows obvious divergence between the japonica and indica lineages.
answer: Knockout lines (KO-GL10) with a frameshift mutation resulted in significantly decreased grain length, width, and weight compared to the HJX74 wild-type line. However, GL10 overexpression lines showed increased grain length and weight. GL10 was found to be a positive regulator of grain length, weight, and heading date. It promotes longitudinal cell growth in the grain glume and regulates genes in the gibberellic acid signaling pathway in young panicle tissues. Differences were observed in GL10 haplotypes between the japonica and indica lineages.

question:
截止2024年7月，文献搜索显示OsAL50基因的功能受生长阶段的影响，该突变体的幼苗从三叶阶段开始产生白色条纹叶表型，在四叶阶段尤为明显，此后从五叶阶段开始逐渐变绿。到达七叶阶段时，osal50突变体幼苗几乎表现出与野生型一致的正常绿色叶表型。(Zeng et al. 2024)

2. 在七叶转绿阶段，基因OsHEMA1, OsCAB1R, OsPETA, OsPETB, 和OsRBCS  在osal50突变体水稻中表达量显著高于野生型。这些结果表明，OsAL50基因在七叶转绿阶段负向调节这些基因。(Zeng et al. 2024)
answer: OsAL50基因的功能受生长阶段影响，其突变体幼苗在三叶阶段开始出现白色条纹，四叶阶段最明显，五叶阶段开始变绿，七叶阶段与野生型一致。在四叶阶段，与叶绿素、类胡萝卜素合成、叶绿体发育和光合作用相关的25个基因在osal50突变体中显著下调，显示OsAL50基因正向调节这些基因。在七叶阶段，5个基因在osal50突变体中表达量高于野生型，显示OsAL50基因负向调节这些基因。

Nipponbare）基因组第三代测序结果显示，基因起始位点至终止位点为30007436- 30015615，序列全长8180bp，编码的SUMO（small ubiquitin-related modifer） E3连接酶被预测的蛋白质域有PHD (plant homeodomain）, SAP (scaffold attachment factor A/B/acinus/PIAS), zf-MIZ (MIZ/SP-RING zinc finger)（RiceSuperPIRdb）。OsSIZ2在不同数据库中的基因编号如下：水稻注释计划数据库(The Rice Annotation Project Database，RAP-DB)：Os03g0719100；水稻基因组注释项目数据库（Rice Genome Annotation Project，RGAP）：LOC_Os03g50980；稻属超级泛基因组数据库(Rice Super Pan-genome Information Resource Database, RiceSuperPIRdb)：AGIS_Os03g044120。

2. 影响磷酸盐稳态：OsSIZ2基因突变体在营养生长过程中影响磷酸盐Pi（phosphate）的吸收和转运，在收获期引发了不同组织中总磷浓度的升高，对参与维持磷酸盐稳态相关基因的表达产生了不同的影响。
3. 调控水稻氮稳态和生殖生长：缺氮条件下，OsSIZ2-Ri植株和ossiz2突变体根中的总氮量比野生型显著增加。
4. 在氮的吸收和转运中发挥作用：qRT-PCR分析发现参与氮稳态的几个基因表达量在ossiz2突变体中发生改变。
answer: OsSIZ2基因在营养生长和生殖生长阶段对生长发育有正向调节作用。它影响磷酸盐的吸收和转运，导致总磷浓度升高，并对相关基因的表达产生影响。在缺氮条件下，OsSIZ2基因能增加根中的总氮量，调控水稻的氮稳态和生殖生长。此外，它还在氮的吸收和转运中起作用，影响相关基因的表达。

Summary:
question:
1． Rice hcar mutants, with highly retaining of chlorophyll level, exhibit a stay-green phenotype during dark-induced leaf senescence
2． Experiments report that rice HCAR (Chl b reductases, 7-hydroxymethyl Chl a reductase) is CCE (Chl catabolic enzymes) that converts 7-HMC a (7-hydroxymethyl Chl a) to Chl a
3． The rice hcar mutant shows cell death symptoms in mature leaves, is susceptible to oxidative stress-induced cell death, suggesting rice HCAR proteins play a role in regulating the oxidative stress response and cell death.
4． Genes that are upregulated during cell death, such as JAmyb, Os-NAC4, and OsAPX1, were significantly upregulated in hcar mutant leaves versus wild type, especially under high light
answer: Rice hcar mutants, which retain high levels of chlorophyll, display a stay-green phenotype during dark-induced leaf senescence. Rice HCAR, a chlorophyll catabolic enzyme, converts 7-hydroxymethyl chlorophyll a to chlorophyll a. The hcar mutant is susceptible to oxidative stress-induced cell death, indicating that rice HCAR proteins regulate the oxidative stress response and cell death. Genes upregulated during cell death, such as JAmyb, Os-NAC4, and OsAPX1, are significantly more active in hcar mutant leaves than in wild type, particularly under high light.

Summary:
question:
OsBRXL1全名是BREVIS RADIX-like 1基因。
我们基于水稻日本晴（Oryza sativa ssp. japonica cv. Nipponbare）的第三代测序结果，并对语料进行深度检索发现，OsBRXL1基因位于2号染色体的负链上，基因起始位点至终止位点为29316726- 29323651，序列全长6926 bp，编码BRX蛋白。
OsBRXL1在不同数据库中的基因编号如下：水稻注释计划数据库(The Rice Annotation Project Database，RAP-DB)：Os02g0700700；水稻基因组注释项目数据库（Rice Genome Annotation Project，RGAP）：LOC_Os02g47230；稻属超级泛基因组数据库(Rice Super Pan-genome Information Resource Database, RiceSuperPIRdb)：AGIS_Os02g042580。
answer: OsBRXL1是BREVIS RADIX-like 1基因的全名，位于水稻日本晴的2号染色体负链上，序列全长6926 bp，编码BRX蛋白。在不同数据库中，OsBRXL1的基因编号分别为：RAP-DB的Os02g0700700，RGAP的LOC_Os02g47230，以及RiceSuperPIRdb的AGIS_Os02g042580。

Summary:
question:
FLO10全名是floury endosperm10基因。
我们基于水稻日本晴（Oryza sativa ssp. japonica cv. Nipponbare）的第三代测序结果，并对语料进行深度检索发现，FLO10基因与 WBG1（white belly grain 1）基因为等位基因，FLO10基因位于3号染色体的负链上，基因起始位点至终止位点为3700628 - 3705060，序列全长4433 bp，编码一个线粒体定位的P型PPR蛋白，带有26个PPR基序。
FLO10在不同数据库中的基因编号如下：水稻注释计划数据库(The Rice Annotation Project Database，RAP-DB)：Os03g0168400；水稻基因组注释项目数据库（Rice Genome Annotation Project，RGAP）：LOC_Os03g07220；稻属超级泛基因组数据库(Rice Super Pan-genome Information Resource Database, RiceSuperPIRdb)：AGIS_Os03g005990。
answer: FLO10是floury endosperm10基因的全名，位于水稻日本晴的3号染色体的负链上，与WBG1基因为等位基因。该基因序列全长4433 bp，编码一个线粒体定位的P型PPR蛋白，带有26个PPR基序。在不同数据库中，FLO10的基因编号分别为：RAP-DB的Os03g0168400，RGAP的LOC_Os03g07220，以及RiceSuperPIRdb的AGIS_Os03g005990。

Summary:
question:
在国家水稻数据中心（China Rice Data Center）中搜索，根据Trait Ontology分类推测TAC4基因可能影响的植物性状包括：蛋白质含量(TO:0000598), 直链淀粉含量(TO:0000196), 粉质胚乳(TO:0000104), 总淀粉含量(TO:0000696), 脂质总含量(TO:0000602), 千粒重(TO:0000592), 淀粉粒大小(TO:0002655), 籽粒灌浆速率(TO:1002661)。
在RiceSuperPIRdb数据库中检索FLO10基因的T2T基因编号，预测FLO10基因的功能是：含PPR重复结构域蛋白。其GO分析和KEGG分析发现OsCHR709基因的功能包括：GO:0003674_molecular_function(molecular function)，GO:0003676_nucleic acid binding(molecular function)，GO:0003723_RNA binding(molecular function)，GO:0003824_catalytic activity(molecular function)，GO:0004518_nuclease activity(molecular function)等。
在RAPDB数据库中搜索发现，FLO10基因有以下功能：Hypothetical conserved gene. (Os03t0168400-01);P-type pentatricopeptide repeat (PPR) protein; Maintenance of mitochondrial function and endosperm development; Trans-splicing of the mitochondrial nad1 intron1 (Os03t0168400-02)。
在EnsemblPlants数据库中，FLO10基因有以下功能：GO:0004526_ribonuclease P activity(molecular function), GO:0001682_tRNA 5'-leader removal(biological process)。
answer: 在国家水稻数据中心，TAC4基因可能影响的植物性状包括蛋白质含量、直链淀粉含量、粉质胚乳、总淀粉含量、脂质总含量、千粒重、淀粉粒大小和籽粒灌浆速率。RiceSuperPIRdb数据库预测FLO10基因的功能是含PPR重复结构域蛋白，其功能包括分子功能、核酸结合、RNA结合、催化活性和核酸酶活性。RAPDB数据库显示，FLO10基因功能包括保持线粒体功能和胚乳发育，以及线粒体nad1内含子1的反剪接。在EnsemblPlants数据库中，FLO10基因的功能包括核糖核酸酶P活性和tRNA 5'-领导者移除。

instruction:
你是一个文本阅读助手，你的任务是使用简洁的语言总结文本，包含全部要点。
    
请注意：
1. 你是个非常严谨的文本阅读助手，永远不要编造内容
2. 请使用简洁的语言总结文本，包含全部要点。
3. 如果原材料是中文，生成的内容也应该是中文。如果原材料是英文，生成的内容也应该是英文。

原材料：
{}

总结：
question:
1.维持线粒体功能。flo10中呼吸链复合体I的组装和活性显著降低，ATP合成下降，线粒体结构也表现异常。FLO10功能缺失会影响线粒体nad1基因内含子1的反式剪接，导致nad1外显子1和外显子2-5前体的积累。
2.在胚乳发育过程中起重要作用。与野生型相比，flo10突变体营养期和生殖期生长明显减慢，成熟时米粒小且不透明、粉白色，灌浆速率显著降低，千粒重约降低36%，淀粉和直链淀粉含量降低，但蛋白质和脂肪含量升高，胚乳中淀粉颗粒变小，且糊粉层细胞结构异常。
answer: FLO10基因在维持线粒体功能和胚乳发育过程中起重要作用。其功能缺失会导致线粒体功能降低，影响nad1基因的剪接。在胚乳发育过程中，FLO10突变体的生长速度减慢，米粒小且不透明，淀粉含量降低，蛋白质和脂肪含量升高，淀粉颗粒变小，细胞结构异常。

Summary:
question:
CDPK13全名是calcium dependent protein kinase基因。
我们基于水稻日本晴（Oryza sativa ssp. japonica cv. Nipponbare）的第三代测序结果，并对语料进行深度检索发现，OsCDPK13基因与OsCDPK7为同一个基因，是一种钙依赖性蛋白激酶。CDPK13基因位于4号染色体的正链上，基因起始位点至终止位点为30037475 - 30042744，序列全长5270 bp，编码蛋白激酶。
CDPK13在不同数据库中的基因编号如下：水稻注释计划数据库(The Rice Annotation Project Database，RAP-DB)：Os04g0584600；水稻基因组注释项目数据库（Rice Genome Annotation Project，RGAP）：LOC_Os04g49510；稻属超级泛基因组数据库(Rice Super Pan-genome Information Resource Database, RiceSuperPIRdb)：AGIS_Os04g043580。
answer: CDPK13，全名为calcium dependent protein kinase，是一种钙依赖性蛋白激酶基因。基于水稻日本晴的第三代测序结果，研究发现OsCDPK13基因与OsCDPK7为同一个基因。该基因位于4号染色体的正链上，序列全长5270 bp。在不同数据库中，CDPK13的基因编号分别为：RAP-DB的Os04g0584600，RGAP的LOC_Os04g49510，以及RiceSuperPIRdb的AGIS_Os04g043580。

OsCS1 is annotated with the following gene identifiers in various databases: Rice Annotation Project Database (RAP-DB): Os02g0194100; Rice Genome Annotation Project (RGAP): LOC_Os02g10070; Rice Super Pan-genome Information Resource Database (RiceSuperPIRdb): AGIS_Os02g008640.
answer: OsCS1, also known as citrate synthase 1, is a gene identified in the Oryza sativa ssp. japonica cv. Nipponbare. It is located on the negative strand of chromosome 2, with a sequence length of 6622 bp. This gene encodes citrate synthase and is identified as Os02g0194100 in the Rice Annotation Project Database (RAP-DB), LOC_Os02g10070 in the Rice Genome Annotation Project (RGAP), and AGIS_Os02g008640 in the Rice Super Pan-genome Information Resource Database (RiceSuperPIRdb).

The OsCHR709 gene is located on the negative strand of chromosome 2, spanning from position 28782722 to 28788607, with a total sequence length of 5886 bp, encoding SNF2 family protein.
OsCHR709 is annotated with the following gene identifiers in various databases: Rice Annotation Project Database (RAP-DB): Os02g0689800; Rice Genome Annotation Project (RGAP): LOC_Os02g46450; Rice Super Pan-genome Information Resource Database (RiceSuperPIRdb): AGIS_Os02g041810.

It is homologous to Arabidopsis PIE1 and is located on the negative strand of chromosome 2. The gene encodes an SNF2 family protein and has a total sequence length of 5886 bp. It is listed in various databases under different identifiers, including Os02g0689800 in RAP-DB, LOC_Os02g46450 in RGAP, and AGIS_Os02g041810 in RiceSuperPIRdb.

Summary:
question: After soybean mosaic virus (SMV) inoculation, no obvious symptoms were observed in either resistant R-line ‘Kefeng 1’ or susceptible S-line ‘NN1138-2’ until 5 days post inoculation (dpi). S-line shoots showed clear symptoms: wrinkling on infected trifoliate leaves at 7 dpi, chlorosis at 9 dpi, and leaf curling at 11 dpi, whereas all R-line shoots were asymptomatic until 9 dpi and some of them had small yellow spots on leaves at 11 dpi .
answer: After inoculation with soybean mosaic virus (SMV), both resistant R-line ‘Kefeng 1’ and susceptible S-line ‘NN1138-2’ showed no symptoms until 5 days post-inoculation. By 7 days, S-line shoots exhibited leaf wrinkling, followed by chlorosis at 9 days and leaf curling at 11 days. In contrast, R-line shoots remained asymptomatic until 9 days, with only some showing small yellow spots by 11 days.

Summary:
question: In this study, 58 DEGs were associated with IAA signaling, which was the highest among all hormones. The transcriptome sequencing data clearly showed that 5 dpi was the most important time point for IAA signaling compared to other inoculation time points, as the majority of up-regulated IAA-related genes were in the 5 dpi vs. 1 dpi group (23 genes, e.g., IAA4-like, GH3.6, SAUR32, and LAX12), and most of the down-regulated IAA-related genes were also in this group (8 genes, e.g., GH3.2, SAUR71, and IAA13-like).
answer: In the study, 58 differentially expressed genes (DEGs) were linked to IAA signaling, the most among all hormones. Transcriptome sequencing highlighted 5 days post-inoculation (dpi) as crucial for IAA signaling, with the majority of up-regulated IAA-related genes (23 genes, such as IAA4-like and GH3.6) and down-regulated genes (8 genes, such as GH3.2 and IAA13-like) identified in the 5 dpi vs. 1 dpi comparison.

Summary:
question: There are multiple tryptophan-dependent IAA biosynthesis pathways in plants. The tryptophan aminotransferases TAR1 and TAR2 convert trp to indole-3-pyruvate (IPA), which is converted to indole acetic acid (IAA) by the YUCCA flavin monooxygenase. Further, superroot2 (SUR2) encodes the cytochrome P450 monooxygenase CYP83B1, involved in glucosinolate biosynthesis and auxin homeostasis. We found two PBZ-up SUR2 at 12 HAI and one PBZ-down TAR2 at 24 HAI, indicating that GA promotes IAA production at these time points.
answer: There are several tryptophan-dependent pathways for IAA biosynthesis in plants. Tryptophan aminotransferases TAR1 and TAR2 convert tryptophan to indole-3-pyruvate (IPA), which is then converted to indole acetic acid (IAA) by YUCCA flavin monooxygenase. The superroot2 (SUR2) gene encodes the cytochrome P450 monooxygenase CYP83B1, which is involved in glucosinolate biosynthesis and auxin homeostasis. Research indicates that gibberellin (GA) promotes IAA production, as evidenced by the upregulation of SUR2 at 12 hours after induction (HAI) and downregulation of TAR2 at 24 HAI.

Summary:
question: Multiple sequence alignment of all twelve differentially expressed MCM genes in the soybean seed coat was completed with the sequences of known MCM genes in Arabidopsis (AtMCM2–7), maize (ZmMCM2–7), pea (PsMCM2–7), and two Brassica species (B. oleracea BoMCM2–7, B. rapa BrMCM2–7) . Soybean MCM2 and MCM7 genes had between ~76–84% amino acid identity with both B. oleracea and B. rapa MCM genes, while soybean MCM4, 5 and 6 genes showed higher amino acid sequence similarity with B. rapa MCM genes (Additional file 6: Table S4), ranging from ~73–78% identity. Soybean MCM3 (GmMCM3) genes Glyma05g25980 and Glyma08g08920 had 76–77% identity with BoMCM3 and BrMCM3_2, but 32% identity with BrMCM3_1.
answer: A multiple sequence alignment was conducted for twelve differentially expressed MCM genes in the soybean seed coat, comparing them with known MCM genes in Arabidopsis, maize, pea, and two Brassica species. Soybean MCM2 and MCM7 genes showed 76–84% amino acid identity with both B. oleracea and B. rapa MCM genes. Soybean MCM4, 5, and 6 genes had higher similarity with B. rapa MCM genes, with 73–78% identity. Soybean MCM3 genes Glyma05g25980 and Glyma08g08920 had 76–77% identity with BoMCM3 and BrMCM3_2, but only 32% identity with BrMCM3_1.

question: The seed-flooding tolerance of 347 soybean lines of YHSBG population was evaluated using three germination-related traits GR, NSR and EC. The values of descriptive statistics, ANOVA (F-value) and estimates of heritability (h2) for all three studied traits of the YHSBG population in two different environments JP14 and HY15 were presented in Table 1. In JP14, the mean of GR and NSR were 0.55 and 0.40, respectively, and their ranges were 0–1.00 and 0–0.94. Furthermore, the mean of EC was 1248 us/mL, and ranges from 153 to 2840 us/mL. However, compared with the mean in JP14, the means of GR and NSR in HY15 were lower, whereas the mean of EC was relatively higher (Table 1), suggesting that seed-flooding tolerance in soybean is an environmentally sensitive trait.
answer: The seed-flooding tolerance of 347 soybean lines from the YHSBG population was assessed using germination-related traits GR, NSR, and EC across two environments, JP14 and HY15. In JP14, the mean values for GR and NSR were 0.55 and 0.40, respectively, with ranges of 0–1.00 and 0–0.94, while EC had a mean of 1248 us/mL, ranging from 153 to 2840 us/mL. In HY15, GR and NSR means were lower, and EC mean was higher, indicating that seed-flooding tolerance is sensitive to environmental conditions.

Summary:

Summary:
question: Gene duplication, including tandem and segmental duplications, is widespread in plant genomes, which is considered one of the major driving forces of genome evolution resulting in large gene family expansion in plants [30]. Duplicated genes are the source for creating novel genetic variation. MCScanX was used to analyze the gene duplications of Gmzf_CCCHs [31]. In total, 88 genes were involved in duplication. Five gene pairs Glyma02g17250/Glyma02g17260, Glyma03g30020/Glyma03g30030, Glyma09g35980Glyma09g35990, Glyma10g02550/Glyma10g02540, and Glyma12g01340/Glyma12g01350, were identified as tandem duplicated genes and located on chromosomes Gm02, Gm03, Gm09, Gm10 and Gm12 . 75% (87 of 116) of Gmzf_CCCHs were involved in segmental duplication forming 68 segmentally duplicated gene pairs (Table S3 and S4).
answer: Gene duplication, including tandem and segmental duplications, is prevalent in plant genomes and drives genome evolution, leading to large gene family expansions. In a study using MCScanX, 88 Gmzf_CCCH genes were found to be duplicated. Five gene pairs were identified as tandem duplications on specific chromosomes, while 75% of Gmzf_CCCHs were involved in segmental duplication, forming 68 segmentally duplicated gene pairs.

Summary:
question: After seven days of treatment, the soybean germplasm accessions exhibited a range of responses to alkaline treatment (AT), from sensitive to moderately tolerant and highly tolerant. Extremely sensitive accessions experienced the wilting of aboveground leaves, plant death, and significant reductions in both shoot and root biomass compared to CK . Accessions with moderate alkaline tolerance displayed yellowing and the wilting of leaves, as well as reductions in shoot and root biomass under AT . However, compared to sensitive cultivars, those with moderate alkaline tolerance exhibited a lesser reduction in both shoot and root biomass when exposed to AT, while alkaline-tolerant soybean accessions showed the least impact on root and shoot biomass under AT relative to CK .
answer: After seven days of alkaline treatment, soybean germplasm accessions showed varying levels of tolerance, from sensitive to highly tolerant. Extremely sensitive accessions experienced leaf wilting, plant death, and significant biomass reduction. Moderately tolerant accessions showed yellowing and wilting of leaves with reduced biomass, but less so than sensitive ones. Highly tolerant accessions had the least impact on biomass compared to control conditions.

Summary:
question: Grouping the 357 soybean landraces into clusters corresponding to their major categories is a key step in highlighting the basic population structure of these landraces. Although genetic studies of landraces can reveal distinct genotypes, direct and precise genotype partitioning is difficult. As a result, we used K-means clustering algorithms to identify and group these landraces based on their similarities. We used the elbow method, which enables the determination of the number of clusters by the curve’s elbow . Using the elbow approach, we detected three clusters/groups (i.e., K = 3), with groups I, II, and III containing 92, 105, and 160 landraces, respectively, all three of which were found to have varying degrees of admixture.
answer: The study grouped 357 soybean landraces into clusters to understand their population structure. Using K-means clustering and the elbow method, three clusters were identified: Group I with 92 landraces, Group II with 105, and Group III with 160. Each group exhibited varying levels of admixture.

Summary:
question: Based on obtained annotation information, possible role in root development, and expression profiles related to root organs/tissues (e.g., roots, root stripped, root nodules, and root tips), we drew up a shortlist of 55 candidate genes (Table S4). We first used the ePlant (https://bar.utoronto.ca/eplant_soybean/, accessed on 16 April 2022) database to analyze the expression patterns of 55 candidate genes in different tissues. The result showed that all candidate genes were expressed in soybean root tissues . Furthermore, we selected the six highest expressed genes (Glyma.11g209100, Glyma.09g051100, Glyma.01g220600, Glyma.05g225700 Glyma.11g209200, and Glyma.13g261700) in the root, and data analysis was completed for these six genes using RNA-Seq soybean libraries (4085) and compared with other tissues (leaf, seedling, shoot, stem, meristem, flower, pod, nodule, seed, embryo, and endosperm). The result showed differential expression levels of six selected candidate genes in the othertissues .
answer: Based on annotation information and expression profiles related to root development, 55 candidate genes were shortlisted for analysis. Using the ePlant database, all candidates were found to be expressed in soybean root tissues. The six highest expressed genes in the root (Glyma.11g209100, Glyma.09g051100, Glyma.01g220600, Glyma.05g225700, Glyma.11g209200, and Glyma.13g261700) were further analyzed using RNA-Seq libraries, revealing differential expression levels compared to other tissues such as leaf, seedling, and flower.

Summary:
question: The rate of glucose utilization by cells is known to be influenced by various environmental factors [25]. One of the outcomes of the current study was to observe the effects of heat stress on carbohydrate metabolism, specifically in glycolysis and the pentose phosphate pathway (PPP). Oxidative PPP is a major source of reducing power and metabolic intermediates for several biosynthetic processes in the cell, and apparent change in the cellular abundance of certain PPP metabolites often severely affects several other metabolism pathways [26]. Analysis of this study revealed that during heat stress, the amount of major glycolysis and PPP metabolites, such as glucose, dihydroxy acetone phosphate and pyruvate, decreased drastically compared to the control treatment .
answer: The study examined the impact of heat stress on carbohydrate metabolism, focusing on glycolysis and the pentose phosphate pathway (PPP). It found that heat stress significantly reduced the levels of key metabolites like glucose, dihydroxyacetone phosphate, and pyruvate, which are crucial for glycolysis and the oxidative PPP, affecting other metabolic pathways.

Summary:
question: Increases in valine and leucine upon drought stress can also result from the consistent increase in the substrate pyruvate, which also featured in our GC-MS-based results [44]. Glycine and proline are two major organic osmolytes that were highly accumulated  in response to drought stress [46,47]. answer: In drought-stressed soybean leaves, there is an increase in valine and leucine due to elevated pyruvate levels. This aligns with findings in Arabidopsis. Summary:
question: In agreement with proteomic findings (Das et al. [49]), a direct correlation for key amino acids such as glutamine and glutamate was reflected in this metabolomic investigation. The proteomics study [49] indicated that cytosolic glutamine synthetase, which assimilates ammonium to glutamine using glutamate as a substrate, is reduced significantly during drought, and alleviates nitric oxide (active radicals) levels to activate drought tolerance mechanisms in soybeans. Our metabolic data supports proteomic findings, as glutamate was found to be reduced during drought stress.
answer: The metabolomic investigation aligns with proteomic findings, showing a direct correlation for key amino acids like glutamine and glutamate. During drought, cytosolic glutamine synthetase, which converts ammonium to glutamine using glutamate, is significantly reduced, helping activate drought tolerance mechanisms in soybeans by alleviating nitric oxide levels. Metabolic data confirms glutamate reduction under drought stress.

Summary:
question: Specifically, purine and pyrimidine nucleotides directly participate in nucleic acid synthesis, which provides the ultimate energy source for the synthesis of carbohydrates, lipids, peptides and secondary metabolites [55]. The de novo pyrimidine biosynthetic pathway (orotate pathway) is defined as the formation of uridine monophosphate (UMP)from carbamoyl phosphate (CP), orotate, 5-phosphoribosyl-1-pyrophosphate (PRPP), and a few other phosphate metabolites [56]. Our metabolomics profiling result indicates that the major building blocks, which are pyrimidine bases such as thymine, cytosine and uracil, are reduced significantly upon heat stress, which affects overall pyrimidine biosynthesis and nucleic acid biosynthesis .
answer: Purine and pyrimidine nucleotides are crucial for nucleic acid synthesis, providing energy for synthesizing carbohydrates, lipids, peptides, and secondary metabolites. The de novo pyrimidine biosynthetic pathway involves forming uridine monophosphate (UMP) from carbamoyl phosphate, orotate, and other metabolites. Heat stress significantly reduces pyrimidine bases like thymine, cytosine, and uracil, impacting pyrimidine and nucleic acid biosynthesis.

Summary:
question: Energy metabolism is substantially higher in young leaves than that in mature leaves. Indeed, young leaves are actively growing and require a substantial and sustained amount of energy to support their metabolism. As a result, they tend to have higher rates of photosynthesis and respiration than mature leaves. (26,27) A previous study showed that monosaccharides are biosynthesized through photosynthesis in bean (Phaseolus vulgaris) leaves at an early stage while sucrose biosynthesis takes place in mature leaves. (20) In agreement, we detected many monosaccharides (xylose, galactose, mannose, glucose, and fructose) that are biosynthesized through photosynthesis and respiration during the V stages of soybean leaf development. Also during the V stages, energy metabolism was active, leading to an accumulation of tricarboxylic acid (TCA) cycle intermediates (fumaric and malic acid).

Young leaves primarily biosynthesize monosaccharides, while mature leaves focus on sucrose biosynthesis. In soybean leaf development, during the V stages, active energy metabolism results in the accumulation of TCA cycle intermediates like fumaric and malic acid.

Summary:

Summary:
question: In similar conditions in other studies, glyphosate reduced root growth (length and weight) of susceptible soybean [21]. Consistent with the cited reports, glyphosate also reduced the root length of susceptible soybean seedlings . In contrast, glyphosate did not affect the root growth of GR soybeans—an expected result because this cultivar tolerates the herbicide. However, since glyphosate residues and its metabolite aminomethylphosphonic acid (AMPA) were found in GR soybean seeds in field’s conditions [22], growth and yield cannot be assumed to be unchanged. Glyphosate reduced the root growth of GR soybeans in greenhouse studies [23], but did not affect soybean growth in field experiments [24]. At least for the short-term experimental conditions reported in this work, the root length of GR soybeans was unaffected by glyphosate treatment.
answer: Glyphosate reduces root growth in susceptible soybean varieties but does not affect glyphosate-resistant (GR) soybeans in field conditions. However, glyphosate residues and its metabolite AMPA were found in GR soybean seeds, suggesting potential impacts on growth and yield. In greenhouse studies, glyphosate reduced root growth in GR soybeans, but field experiments showed no effect on growth. In the short-term, GR soybean root length was unaffected by glyphosate.

Summary:
question: The cultivar Jiaoda 133 is a vegetable soybean, and Williams 82 is a grain soybean; there are several seed phenotypic differences between them. The Jiaoda 133 pods harvested at the R6 stage (stage 6)  and boiled in water for 7 min, tasted sweet, soft and fragrant, whereas those of Williams 82 were hard and neither sweet nor fragrant. For vegetable soybean, the sweet taste is a key trait. To check out which sugar contributed to the sweet taste, we measured the content of four sugars (sucrose, fructose, glucose, and maltose) in fresh seeds at the stage R6. The sucrose content was significantly higher in Jiaoda 133 (2.39 g/100 g) than Williams 82 (1.52 g/100 g). The contents of fructose and glucose were low, with no significant differences between Jiaoda 133 and Williams 82. No maltose was detected . These results suggested that the sweet taste was determined mainly by sucrose content. The pods and fresh grains of Jiaoda 133 were much larger than those of Williams 82 at various developmental stages . At maturity, the 100-grain weight of Jiaoda 133 was 31.38 g and that of Williams 82 was 17.87 g (that 1.75-fold difference was significant) .
answer: The cultivar Jiaoda 133 is a vegetable soybean, while Williams 82 is a grain soybean, with notable seed phenotypic differences. Jiaoda 133 pods, harvested at the R6 stage and boiled, are sweet, soft, and fragrant, unlike the hard and less flavorful Williams 82 pods. The sweet taste of Jiaoda 133 is primarily due to its higher sucrose content (2.39 g/100 g) compared to Williams 82 (1.52 g/100 g), with no significant differences in fructose and glucose levels and no maltose detected. Jiaoda 133 also has larger pods and grains, with a 100-grain weight of 31.38 g, significantly heavier than Williams 82's 17.87 g.

Summary:
question: The sweeter taste is one of the major differences between grain and vegetable soybeans, which is determined by the higher sucrose content in vegetable soybean. Therefore, we focused on the expressions of genes related to sucrose metabolism and transport. Genes for sweet and waxy corn had been studied, and eight genes of maize endosperm mutant have been used for commercial breeding, including shrunken2 (sh2), brittle1 (bt1), brittle2 (bt2), sugary1 (su1), sugary enhancer1 (se1), amylose extender1 (ae1), dull endosperm1 (du1), and waxy1 (wx1) (Yang and Wang, 2005). The expression of most genes homologous to sh2, bt1 and su1 was higher in Williams 82 than Jiaoda 133 , which would contribute to accumulation of sucrose in Jiaoda 133. In contrast, the expression of genes homologous to bt2, se1, ae1, and du1 was lower in Williams 82 than Jiaoda 133 , which could increase the amylopectin content and contribute to waxy taste in Jiaoda 133. The expression patterns of two genes homologous to wx1 were opposite in the two genotypes , potentially leading to no difference in amylose
answer: The sweeter taste of vegetable soybeans compared to grain soybeans is due to higher sucrose content. Research focused on genes related to sucrose metabolism and transport, similar to studies on sweet and waxy corn. Eight maize endosperm mutant genes are used in breeding, including sh2, bt1, bt2, su1, se1, ae1, du1, and wx1. In soybean genotypes, Williams 82 showed higher expression of genes homologous to sh2, bt1, and su1, contributing to sucrose accumulation in Jiaoda 133. Conversely, Jiaoda 133 had higher expression of genes homologous to bt2, se1, ae1, and du1, increasing amylopectin content and waxy taste. The wx1 gene expression was opposite in the two genotypes, resulting in no difference in amylose content.

Summary:
question: To evaluate the influence of haplotypes on soybean seed traits, we examined the association between haplotypes and seed oil content in soybean collections. Hap_S has a very low seed oil content but very high seed protein content . This result was consistent with well-documented characteristics of wild soybean seeds, which are very small, black, have low oil content, but are rich in protein. In cultivated soybeans, Hap_H displayed a high seed oil content and low protein content, whereas Hap_W showed a relatively low seed oil content but high protein content . With respect to the contrasting seed oil and protein content of Hap_H and Hap_W described above, it is possible that Hap_H and Hap_W may reflect the two classic breeding goals of achieving high oil or high protein varieties, respectively.
answer: The study evaluated the influence of haplotypes on soybean seed traits, focusing on seed oil and protein content. Hap_S is characterized by low seed oil and high protein content, consistent with wild soybean traits. In cultivated soybeans, Hap_H has high seed oil and low protein content, while Hap_W has low seed oil and high protein content. These differences may represent breeding goals for high oil or high protein soybean varieties.

Summary:
question: For centuries, soybean breeders from the northern regions of China have had more enthusiasm to develop varieties with high seed oil contents. Next, we wondered about the reflection of the haplotypes of GmMFT on the soybean breeding traditions in China. An examination of the geographic distribution of the haplotypes in China indicated that Hap_H displayed a decreasing trend from the high-latitude to low-latitude regions. In Northeast China, the frequency of Hap_H is > 88%. However, it decreased to 66% and 34.5% in Central and South China, respectively. By contrast, an opposite trend was observed for Hap_W, whose frequency is < 5% in Northeast China, 32% in Central China, and > 63% in South China . Taken together, these results indicated that the frequencies and distribution of the haplotypes of GmMFT coincided with the soybean breeding traditions in China, suggesting that GmMFT was a hot locus that has been popularly selected for soybean breeding.

Summary:
question: A comprehensive phylogenetic analysis was conducted to establish groups of homology within the GmMIP gene family. The 66 GmMIPs were classified into various subfamilies including 22 GmPIPs, 23 GmTIPs, 13 GmNIPs, six GmSIPs and two new GmXIPs i.e., uncharacterized isoforms . The GmXIPs might be similar to the novel plant AQP subfamily XIP recently reported in moss [15] and tomato [16]. All the members of the GmPIPs subfamily localized to plasma membranes (Table 1). The predicted localization of members of the GmTIPs subfamily was diverse, and predicted localization included cytosol, plasma membrane, endoplasmic reticulum, vacuole, mitochondria and chloroplast. From the GmNIPs subfamily, GmNIP1;1 and GmNIP4;1 localized to vacuoles, GmNIP2;2 to extra-cellular structures and the rest to plasma membranes. Two members of the GmSIP subfamily localized to vacuoles and the remainder to plasma membranes. GmXIP1;1 localized to extra-cellular structures and GmXIP1;2 to cytosol. The ka/ks ratio was >1 and 1 for PseudoPIP#3 and PseudoSIP#1, and PseudoPIP#2, respectively. The remaining GmMIPs showed ka/ks ratio <1 .
answer: A phylogenetic analysis of the GmMIP gene family identified 66 members divided into subfamilies: 22 GmPIPs, 23 GmTIPs, 13 GmNIPs, six GmSIPs, and two new GmXIPs. GmPIPs are localized to plasma membranes, while GmTIPs have diverse localizations including cytosol and organelles. GmNIPs and GmSIPs mainly localize to plasma membranes and vacuoles, with some exceptions. GmXIPs are similar to a novel plant AQP subfamily and localize to extracellular structures and cytosol. The ka/ks ratio varied among the genes, indicating different evolutionary pressures.
